name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Nelson VECCHIONE, Appellant

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
NIGRO, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Norris E. Gelman, Marcelle Benjamin, Philadelphia, for Nelson Vecchione.
Catherine Marshall, Alan Sacks, Philadelphia, for Com.
casebody.head_matter:
684 A.2d 120
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Nelson VECCHIONE, Appellant.

Decided Nov. 8, 1996.
Norris E. Gelman, Marcelle Benjamin, Philadelphia, for Nelson Vecchione.
Catherine Marshall, Alan Sacks, Philadelphia, for Com.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
